page.title: 11St.John's Church, Acklington
page.content: {Acklington Church}was built in 1861. Before 1861 there was a tin chapel where the people of Acklington Village went to worship. The present vicar (who is also vicar of Warkworth) is {Rev.Canon Anthony Duncan.}He has worked in Acklington for 6\ years. The main service in Acklington is the {Sunday Holy Communion}at 10.30 a.m. Average congregation is about 30. Records show that the first marriage in the church dates back to 1862. Since then{228 weddings}have taken place in St.John's Church. A major problem for church members this year is finding Â£3,000 to cover the cost of repairs to the walls and a new boiler. Various{fund-raising {events}have been planned, including the following efforts from last month: Coffee Morning{Â£116;}Produce Stall{Â£14 Musical Concert{Â£85;}Summer Fete{Â£196.
